name: Terri-Fried GB UNFINISHED
description:
WARNING... THE GAME IS NOT COMPLETE. PRACTICALLY EVERYTHING IS BROKEN

I tried to port Polymars' game Terri-Fried to gameboy, I used his open source code as a base but I had to change about 90% of it. I think I would have been better just writing it form scratch. Live and learn I guess.

I added the source code if you want to try to fix it (I made it in GBDK).

CONTROLS: you have to hold Z and then use the arrow keys
